• The film earned its massive opening weekend because people didn't just watch it but celebrated it

• Each is seeded with about a hundred juvenile oysters that will grow into adults, creating an interconnected reef system

items.title: What went right this week: treating the ‘untreatable’, plus more

• Alyssa Tapley, 13, was the first in the world to receive the treatment, known as BE-CAR7

• Mid‑tier wide releases are forecast to generate $4.57 billion, up 10% year on year

• The studio is projecting $76 million overseas for a $226 million global debut
